snippet: President Obama continued his own critique of his debate performance last week, telling Tom Joyner, a talk radio show host, on Wednesday that he was "too polite" with Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney.
abstract: President Obama continued his own critique of his debate performance last week, telling Tom Joyner, a talk radio show host, on Wednesday that he was "too polite" with Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Obama Says He Was 'Too Polite' at Debate
headline.print_headline: Debate Performance Was ‘Too Polite,’ Obama Says
